languages.text: {n}Полдня пути, и Вольному Торговцу открывается новое чудо лесов Кетца Темера — обширный участок земли, заросший красноватой травой в болезненных желтоватых волдырях. Ни одно другое растение не пробивается среди багровых стеблей. Вероятно, разгадка кроется в бледных паукообразных насекомых, ползающих с нижней стороны листьев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Полдня пути, и Вольному Торговцу открывается новое чудо лесов Кетца Темера — обширный участок земли, заросший красноватой травой в болезненных желтоватых волдырях. Ни одно другое растение не пробивается среди багровых стеблей. Вероятно, разгадка кроется в бледных паукообразных насекомых, ползающих с нижней стороны листьев.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Полдня пути, и Вольному Торговцу открывается новое чудо лесов Кетца Темера — обширный участок земли, заросший красноватой травой в болезненных желтоватых волдырях. Ни одно другое растение не пробивается среди багровых стеблей. Вероятно, разгадка кроется в бледных паукообразных насекомых, ползающих с нижней стороны листьев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of the Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious land covered in sickening yellow blisters and overgrown with reddish-brown grass. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer most likely lies in the pale spider-like insects crawling on the backside of the leaves.{/n}

No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer most likely lies in the pale spider-like insects crawling on the backside of the leaves.{/n}

{n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de media jornada, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente descubre una nueva maravilla en los bosques de Quetza Temer: un terreno espacioso cubierto de hierbas de un color ocre sepultadas por repugnantes vesículas amarillentas. No crece ninguna otra planta entre las rojas briznas de hierba. La clave del misterio probablemente sea la presencia de los arácnidos blanquecinos que se mueven por la cara interna de las briznas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de media jornada, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente descubre una nueva maravilla en los bosques de Quetza Temer: un terreno espacioso alfombrado de repugnantes vesículas amarillentas y cubierto de hierbas de un color ocre. No crece ninguna otra planta entre las rojas briznas de hierba. El motivo es probablemente la presencia de los arácnidos blanquecinos que se mueven por la cara interna de las briznas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}到了中午的时候，行商浪人发现了格扎尔特默森林里的新奇观——一片广阔的林地上覆盖着恶心的黄色水泡，红褐色的野草肆意蔓延。红色的草叶之中看不到任何其他植物，草叶背面爬着某种白色的蜘蛛状昆虫。之所以见不到其他植物，问题很可能就出在这种蜘蛛状的昆虫身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}到了中午的时候，行商浪人发现了格扎尔特默森林里的新奇观——广阔的土地上覆盖着恶心的黄色水泡，红褐色野草肆意蔓延。红色的草叶之中看不到任何其他植物，草叶背面爬着某种白色的蜘蛛状昆虫。之所以见不到其他植物，问题很可能就出在这种蜘蛛状的昆虫身上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À la mi-journée, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} découvre une nouvelle merveille des forêts de Quetza Temer : une vaste zone envahie d'herbes rouge-brun couvertes de répugnantes boursouflures jaunâtres. Rien d'autre ne semble pousser à cet endroit. Les pâles arachnides que l'on peut voir au dos des brins d'herbe y sont sans doute pour quelque chose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À la mi-journée, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} découvre une nouvelle merveille des forêts de Quetza Temer : une vaste zone envahie d'herbes rouge-brun couvertes de répugnantes boursouflures jaunâtres. Rien d'autre ne semble pousser à cet endroit. Les pâles arachnides que l'on peut voir au dos des brins d'herbe y sont sans doute pour quelque chose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}半日が過ぎた頃、自由開拓者はケツァ・テメルの森に新たな不思議を発見する。そこは、気味の悪い黄色い気泡に覆われた、赤茶けた草が生い茂る広々とした土地だった。赤い草の他に植物は見当たらなかった。その答えは、葉の裏側を這っている青白いクモのような虫に関係していそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}半日が過ぎた頃、自由開拓者はケツァ・テメルの森に新たな不思議を発見する。そこは、気味の悪い黄色い気泡に覆われた、赤茶けた草が生い茂る広々とした土地だった。赤い草の他に植物は見当たらなかった。その答えは、葉の裏側を這っている青白いクモのような虫に関係していそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etwa zur Mitte des Tages entdeckt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ein weiteres Wunder der Wälder von Quetza Temer ... ein ausgedehntes Gebiet, das von rötlich-braunem Gras überwuchert und von stinkenden gelben Schwären durchzogen ist. Zwischen den roten Grashalmen sind keine anderen Pflanzen zu sehen. Die Antwort auf dieses Mysterium könnte etwas mit den fahlen, spinnenartigen Insekten an der Unterseite der Blätter zu tun haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als der Tag halb vorbei ist, entdeckt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ein neues Wunder der Wälder von Quetza Temer — ein großes Gebiet voller widerwärtiger gelber Blasen, überwuchert mit rötlich-braunem Gras. Zwischen den roten Grashalmen ist keine andere Pflanze zu sehen. Die Antwort liegt vermutlich in den blassen, spinnenähnlichen Insekten, die auf dem Gras herumkrabbeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir, gün ortasına doğru Quetza Temer ormanlarının yeni bir harikasını keşfediyor. Engin bir arazi; tiksindirici sarı kabarcıklarla kaplanmış, kızılımsı kahverengi çimlerle örtülü. Kızıl çimler arasında başka hiçbir bitki görünmüyor. Bu gizemin çözümü, çimlerin altında kaynayan örümcek benzeri solgun böceklerde saklı olabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halfway through the day, the Rogue Trader discovers a new wonder of Quetza Temer's forests — a spacious stretch of land overgrown with reddish-brown grass covered in sickening yellow blisters. No other plant can be seen among the red blades of grass. The answer to this mystery may have something to do with pale spider-like insects crawling on the underside of the blades.{/n}
